ğŸ”† **Resolutions to Follow in the Year 2026 â€“ New Commitments** ğŸ”†

1 . Every day we will have the divine darshan of God and the Guru !

2 . In 24 hours, we will spend 24 minutes daily chanting the Guru Mantra !

3 . We will stay away from bad habits â€“ meat, fish, eggs, alcohol, betel leaf, bidi, gutkha !

4 . We will stay away from lies, deceit, and fraud !

5 . We will serve our parents with great devotion !

6 . Whether you give children birthday gifts or not, be sure to give them values and good sanskar (moral teachings) !

7 . We will wholeheartedly serve Shri Guru Darbar and the temples of God !

8 . From now on, we will wake up early every morning !

9 . Every day, we will bow with respect and offer pranam to our parents, revered Gurus, and in the temple of God !

ğŸ•‰ï¸ Om Satnam Sakshi ğŸ•‰ï¸

**Shri Amrapur Asthan, Jaipur**
